Key Match Events: Bellingham scored the equalizer in the 95th minute
Tielemans scored twice in the first half
Post-Match Reflections: Bellingham praised his team’s resilience after coming back from 2-0 down
Toney expressed satisfaction with his performance and hoped to make an impression for the Euros squad
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a heavy, damp pitch
This was Bellingham’s third international goal
